skills.name: King's Tribute
skills.blurb: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he {{tip|heal|heals}} for a percent of its maximum Health.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy dies near '''Trundle''', he {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|key=%|2 to 7}} of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml: Innate: Whenever an enemy dies near Trundle, he heals for 2% âˆ’ 7% (based on level) of their maximum health.
skills.notes: * ''King's Tribute'' does not trigger when an enemy structure is destroyed.

skills.name: Chomp
skills.blurb: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle's''' next [[basic attack]] within 7 seconds has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 75% for {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
After using the empowered attack, '''Trundle''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} for 5 seconds and reduces the target's {{as|attack damage}} by half that amount for the same duration.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Trundle's next basic attack within 7 seconds has an uncancelable windup, deals bonus physical damage and slows the target by 75% for 0.1 seconds.
After using the empowered attack, Trundle gains bonus attack damage for 5 seconds and reduces the target's attack damage by half that amount for the same duration.
Chomp resets Trundle's basic attack timer.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}}}}
{{st|Attack Damage Reduction|{{ap|20/2 to 40/2}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Chomp'' will still incur the {{sti|{{as|attack damage}}}} increase for '''Trundle''' even if the attack is {{tip|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked}}, missed while he is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, or it is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the attack damage reduction and {{tip|slow}}.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

• Bonus Attack Damage:
  • Attack Damage Reduction:

skills.name: Frozen Domain
skills.blurb: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' coats the target location in ice for 8 seconds. While he is within the area, he gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, and 25% increased {{tip|healing}} from all sources.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Trundle coats the target location in ice for 8 seconds. While he is within the area, he gains bonus attack speed, bonus movement speed, and 25% increased healing from all sources.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|30 to 110}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 52}}%}}

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

skills.name: Pillar of Ice
skills.blurb: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all units directly over it 225 units on cast and acting as impassable terrain for the duration and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all nearby enemies.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Trundle projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, knocking back all units directly over it 225 units on cast and acting as impassable terrain for the duration and slowing all nearby enemies.
skills.notes:
* ''Pillar of Ice'' displaces allied units away from the area but does not render them {{tip|airborne}}.
** Allied {{tip|channel|channels}} (e.g. {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}}) will be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} however.
* ''Pillar of Ice'' cannot be placed inside impassable terrain. Attempting to do so will cause the pillar to spawn in the nearest available spot of accessible terrain.
* ''Pillar Of Ice'' triggers effects such as drawing turret aggro, {{ri|Sudden Impact}} and applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} by dealing 0 {{tip|proc damage|proc}} {{tip|true damage}}.

skills.name: Subjugate
skills.blurb: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' starts draining the life force out of the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|heal|healing}} for a percentage of {{as|their '''current''' '''maximum''' health}}, dealing the same amount as {{as|magic damage}}, stealing 40% of their '''current''' {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}}, and increasing in [[size]] by 18% as well as reducing the target's [[size]] by {{fd|9.9}}%.<br/ >Half of the '''total''' damage and stealing are applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has {{tip|death|died}}.
The {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Trundle starts draining the life force out of the target enemy champion, healing for a percentage of their current maximum health, dealing the same amount as magic damage, stealing 40% of their current armor and magic resistance, and increasing in size by 18% as well as reducing the target's size by 9.9%.
Half of the total damage and stealing are applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has died.
The armor and magic resistance will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20 to 35}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}|Initial Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20/2 to 35/2}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}|Magic Damage Per Second|{{as|{{ap|20/8 to 35/8}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}}}
skills.notes:
* The '''total''' value of armor and magic resist stolen and damage dealt is determined at the time of cast. The stolen [[champion statistic|stats]] do not update dynamically relative to the target's stats at any point during the effect, as the steal is applied to the '''current''' value of armor and magic resistance.
* '''Trundle''' gains {{fd|11.7}} extra [[range]] on his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} (relative to his and enemy center) as a consequence of his increased [[size]].
** So do his enemies.
** He gains {{fd|3.78}} to {{fd|6.255}} range against the target he ''subjugated'', depending on their base size, and so does the target against him.
* '''Trundle''' will lose the buff if the target enters {{tip|resurrection}}.{{bug|2}}
